009package imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic;
010
011
012import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
013
014import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.EigenDecomposition;
015import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
016import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
017import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector;
018import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.SingularValueDecomposition;
019
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
021import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
022
023public class CircleFitHyper extends CircleFitAlgebraic {
024        
025        private final double[] p;       // p = (A,B,C,D) circle parameters
026        
027        public CircleFitHyper(Pnt2d[] points) {
028                this.p = fit(points);
029        }
030        
031        @Override
032        public double[] getParameters() {
033                return this.p;
034        }
035        
036        // -------------------------------------------------------------------------
037        
038        private double[] fit(Pnt2d[] pts) {
039//              IJ.log(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
040                final int n = pts.length;
041                if (n < 3) {
042                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("at least 3 points are required");
043                }
044                
045                double[][] Xa = new double[n][];
046                double xSum = 0;
047                double ySum = 0;
048                double zSum = 0;
049                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
050                        double x = pts[i].getX();
051                        double y = pts[i].getY();
052                        double z = sqr(x) + sqr(y);
053                        Xa[i] = new double[] {z, x, y, 1};
054                        xSum = xSum + x;
055                        ySum = ySum + y;
056                        zSum = zSum + z;
057                }
058                
059                double xMean = xSum / n;        // mean of x_i
060                double yMean = ySum / n;        // mean of y_i
061                double zMean = zSum / n;        // mean of z_i
062
063                RealMatrix X = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(Xa);
064                SingularValueDecomposition svd = new SingularValueDecomposition(X);
065                RealMatrix S = svd.getS();      
066                RealMatrix V = svd.getV();      
067                double[] svals = svd.getSingularValues();       // note: singular values are all positive
068                
069                int k = Matrix.idxMin(svals);
070                double smin = svals[k];
071                double smax = svals[Matrix.idxMax(svals)];
072//              IJ.log("Pratt fitter: svals = " + Matrix.toString(svals));
073//              IJ.log("Pratt fitter: rank(X) = " + svd.getRank());
074                
075                RealVector p = null;                            // solution vector (circle parameters)
076
077                double icond = smin / smax;
078//              IJ.log("Hyper fitter: icond = " + icond);       
079                if (icond < 1e-12) {                    // smin/smax = inverse condition number of X
080//                      IJ.log("Hyper fitter: singular"); // singular case (X is rank deficient)
081                        p = V.getColumnVector(k);
082                } 
083                else {  // regular (non-singular) case
084//                      IJ.log("Hyper fitter: non-singular");
085                                                
086                        RealMatrix N = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][]
087                                        {{ 8 * zMean, 4 * xMean, 4 * yMean, 2 },
088                                         { 4 * xMean,    1  ,   0   , 0 },
089                                         { 4 * yMean,    0  ,   1   , 0 },
090                                         {   2   ,    0  ,   0   , 0 }});
091//                      IJ.log("N = \n" + Matrix.toString(N.getData()));
092                        
093                        RealMatrix Ni = MatrixUtils.inverse(N);
094//                      IJ.log("Ni = \n" + Matrix.toString(Ni.getData()));
095                        
096                        RealMatrix Y = V.multiply(S).multiply(V.transpose());
097                        RealMatrix Z = Y.multiply(Ni).multiply(Y);
098
099                        EigenDecomposition ed = new EigenDecomposition(Z);
100                        double[] evals = ed.getRealEigenvalues();
101//                      IJ.log("evals = " + Matrix.toString(evals));
102//                      CircleFit.printEigenVectors(ed);
103                        
104                        int l = getSmallestPositiveIdx(evals);
105//                      IJ.log("l = " + l);
106                        
107                        RealVector el = ed.getEigenvector(l);
108//                      IJ.log("el = " + Matrix.toString(el.toArray()));
109                        
110                        p = Matrix.solve(Y, el);        // alternatively p = Y^-1 * el
111                        
112//                      RealMatrix Yi = MatrixUtils.inverse(Y);
113//                      p = Yi.operate(el);
114
115                }
116                
117                return p.toArray();                     // p = (A, B, C, D)
118        }
119        
120        
121        private int getSmallestPositiveIdx(double[] x) {
122                double minval = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
123                int minidx = -1;
124                for (int i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
125                        if (x[i] >= 0 && x[i] < minval) {
126                                minval = x[i];
127                                minidx = i;
128                        }
129                }
130                return minidx;
131        }
132}
